name: Composer - Icons & Illustrations
description:
We have created the most flexible and robust Design System to enable you to easily deploy your brand color scheme, fonts, images, and styles into it. Simple, modular and accessible components that will surely power up your designs.

 

Composer Icons and Illustrations file is available in four adjustable variants sizes. We have added part of the Tabler Icons Library which are free and open source icons designed to make any website or app attractive, and visually consistent.

 

Use this file in combination of the Composer Design System - Theme and Components, Composer Design System - Blocks and Surfaces, and Composer Design System - Components Tokens. 

 

Learn more about Composer at: cmpsr.io and storybook.cmpsr.io
